Spear.Name: Spear
Spear.Effect: +2 Hit. A spear may not be used with dual-wielding melee weapons but may be used with a shield.

Shield.Name: Shield
Shield.Effect: +4 Def. Can't be used if the hero has a ranged weapon apart from a Sling, Pistol, Short Bow or a Bow. Can't wield a shield without having a melee weapon.

Tower-Shield.Name: Tower-Shield
Tower-Shield.Effect: +6 Def. Can't be used if the hero has a ranged weapon apart from a Sling, Pistol, Short Bow or a Bow. Can't wield a shield without having a melee weapon.

Divine Hammer.Name: Divine Hammer
Divine Hammer.Effect: Advantage against Undead. Only heroes can dual-wield.

Whip.Name: Whip
Whip.Effect: +1 Atk in the first round of combat when you charge

Fighting Claws.Name: Fighting Claws
Fighting Claws.Effect: +1 Attack. You roll agility with advantage.
